c74object.name: tap.buildassist
c74object.digest: Include files in collectives, applications, and plugins automatically
c74object.description: When a collective, application, or plugin is built this object communicates with Max behind the scenes to automatically add files or folders of files to your build.

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: The path you provide can either be a path to a folder or a file. You should specify which with this attribute. The default is file.

attribute.name: path
attribute.description: For files in the Max searchpath, just provide the name of the file. Otherwise provide a qualified Max-style path for the file to be included.

attribute.name: extension
attribute.description: This attribute sets the object to automatically add an extension that is platform dependent. This should only be needed for external objects.
